chinese: n.海岸，海滨 vi，沿海航行
english: coast

chinese: 这片海岸的景色棒极了。
english: The view of the coast is amazing

chinese: n.求婚
english: proposal

chinese: 这个女人接受了他的求婚。
english: The woman accepted his marriage proposal

chinese: ad）.中世纪的，中古（时代）的
english: medieval

chinese: 城堡和骑士是中世纪的象征。
english: Castles and knights were symbols of the medieval times

chinese: n.【环境】可持续性
english: sustainability

chinese: 这家工厂在环境的可持续性上做投资，采用了各种绿色技术。
english: This factory has invested in environmental sustainability, adopting various green technologies

chinese: n.效率；功效；功率；性能
english: efficiency

chinese: 他认为用三支笔一起写可以提高效率。
english: He believes writing with three pens together can improve efficiency

chinese: 几大气层；空气；气氛
english: atmosphere

chinese: 地球大气层能够吸收太阳的部分能量。
english: The Earth's atmosphere absorbs part of the sun's energy

chinese: ad）.母亲的，母性的；母方的，母系的
english: maternal

chinese: 狂热的粉丝们对三个男孩表达了母性般的爱。
english: The crazy fans were showing their maternal love for the three boys

chinese: n.缰绳 v.控制
english: rein

chinese: 你应该握住缰绳来牵你的马。
english: You should hold the reins to lead your horse

chinese: n.过激分子
english: ultra

chinese: 山羊是个过激分子，他会为了自己的目标采取极端的、攻击性的手段。
english: The goat is an ultra who takes extreme, aggressive measures to fight for his cause

chinese: n.走私者
english: smuggler

chinese: 狐狸当黄金走私者的日子正式结束了！
english: The fox's time as a gold smuggler is officially over

chinese: n.运动，移动
english: motion

chinese: 慢动作清楚地展现了他躲过子弹的全过程。
english: The slow motion clearly shows how he dodges the bullets

chinese: n. 审问
english: interrogation

chinese: 在审问过程中，嫌犯一直保持着沉默。
english: The suspect remained silent throughout the interrogation

chinese: 2薄荷，薄荷糖；造币厂 Y.铸造（硬
english: mint

chinese: 热水冲泡薄荷叶就可以做一杯薄荷茶哦。
english: Add hot water to mint leaves to make mint tea

chinese: adj.可进入的
english: accessible

chinese: 这个秘密花园要用秘密钥匙才能进入。
english: The secret garden is only accessible with the secret key

chinese: n，地基；基金（会）
english: foundation

chinese: 一座坚固的建筑需要有稳固的地基。
english: A strong building needs a solid foundation

chinese: ad），实证的，以观察或实验为根据的
english: empirical

chinese: 实证研究更强调观察而非理论本身。
english: Empirical studies focus more on observation rather than theory alone
